product_summary: OpenDevin is an innovative platform for autonomous software engineers that streamlines development by providing a single platform to code, fix bugs, and ship features. It is powered by artificial intelligence (AI) and large language models (LLMs) that collaborate with human developers to write code, fix bugs, and ship features. Key to OpenDevin is that it comes with a secure sandbox and docker environment that runs external to your system, protecting your system from malicious activity. OpenDevin supports a variety of programming languages, including Python, TypeScript, and Shell, as well as Dockerfile and HTML.
product_cons: May not be suitable for all projects
May require a learning curve to use effectively
LLMs may not always generate accurate or efficient code
Limited support for certain types of coding tasks

product_usecases.details: OpenDevin can automate repetitive coding tasks, such as generating boilerplate code, writing tests, and refactoring code.
OpenDevin can help developers fix bugs by identifying potential issues and suggesting fixes.
OpenDevin can help developers develop new features by generating code and providing suggestions based on user input.
OpenDevin can be used as a learning tool for developers who want to learn new programming languages or improve their coding skills.
OpenDevin can facilitate collaborative development by allowing multiple developers to work on the same project simultaneously.

product_toolfor.details: OpenDevin is designed to help developers of all skill levels write code, fix bugs, and develop new features more efficiently.
OpenDevin can help teams collaborate on development projects, track progress, and manage code changes.
OpenDevin can be used as a learning tool for students who want to learn how to code or improve their coding skills.
OpenDevin can help businesses improve their software development process, reduce costs, and get products to market faster.
OpenDevin can be used as a research tool to study the use of AI and LLMs in software development.

product_pricing: OpenDevin offers a free tier and a paid tier. The free tier includes 2,000 CI/CD minutes per month, 500MB of Packages storage, and access to basic features. The paid tier starts at $4 per user per month and includes unlimited CI/CD minutes, 2GB of Packages storage, and access to premium features.
